Detailed Description

Controller for Software sections.

The SoftwareController is a controller class for actions that present the software products published on the Emeraldion Lodge, provides commenting support, detailed informations for individual software products, and tracks the number of downloads.

Definition at line 26 of file software_controller.php.

Member Function Documentation

SoftwareController::init (  )  [protected]

Custom initialization for the controller object.

Subclassers should override this method to perform specialized initialization. The default implementation does nothing.

Reimplemented from BaseController.

SoftwareController::ratings (  ) 

Action method that shows a list of ratings for software products.

This method shows a list of ratings offered by external software sites like MacUpdate, IUseThis etc.

Action method that shows the development information page for a software product.

This page is only available for open source projects that are hosted on a project hosting website.

SoftwareController::releasenotes (  )

Note:
This action is designed to be called by Sparkle application updater.

SoftwareController::user_quotes (  ) 

Action method that shows a collection of user testimonials for software products.

Note:
This action is intented to be called from AJAX and does not show a full page layout.

Definition at line 322 of file software_controller.php.

SoftwareController::download (  ) 

Action method that performs the download of a software artifact.

For software artifacts that are locally hosted, a DownloadManager is instantiated and the download is automatically started. For externally hosted artifacts, the client is redirected to the appropriate URL.

Definition at line 356 of file software_controller.php.

References HTTP::error(), BaseController::expire_cached_page(), and BaseController::redirect_to().

SoftwareController::download_stats (  ) 

Action method that shows the download statistics for a software release.
